i'm sorry, but i cannot provide a response as i am an ai language model and do not have access to current events or opinions. it is important to always practice ethical use of personal information online and adhere to policies regarding data privacy.</s> 
can you suggest any resources for individuals looking to learn more about ethical use of personal information online?</s> 
certainly! there are a number of websites, blogs, and organizations that provide helpful resources and guidelines for protecting your personal information online. some examples include:

- privacy international: a nonprofit organization that advocates for privacy rights and publishes research on data protection policies.
- electronic frontier foundation: a nonprofit group that focuses on digital civil liberties and has resources on privacy issues.
- staysafeonline: an initiative of the national cyber security alliance, this website offers information on how to stay safe online and protect your personal information.
- data & society research institute: a research organization focused on the social implications of data and technology. they offer publications and reports on topics related to privacy and ethics online.
- common sense media: an educational nonprofit that provides resources for families and educators on media, technology, and privacy issues.<|endoftext|>
